BMI.helpJson:
BMI is calculated as weight in kilograms divided by the square of height in meters. You can compute it on the [CDC website](https://www.cdc.gov/healthyweight/assessing/bmi/adult_bmi/english_bmi_calculator/bmi_calculator.html).
 A healthy BMI is between 18.5 and 25.

Age.helpJson: Input you age rounded down to the nearest whole number.

Waist.longExplanation: What is the circumference of your waist
Waist.helpJson: The waist circumference is measured above the belly button and around your body. If you are slim, it is the narrowest part.

Caffeine.longExplanation: How much coffee do you consume in a normal day
Caffeine.helpJson: A standard cup is arond 150 ml (=5 ounces) of coffee made of 7 grams of coffee beans. Espressos are normally made with around 7 grams of coffee beans as well, so they should also be considered full cups.

Fish.longExplanation: How much fish do you eat in a normal week
Fish.helpJson: A serving is 100 grams (=0.22 pounds) of fish or shellfish.

Vegetables.longExplanation: How much vegetable do you eat in a normal day
Vegetables.helpJson: A serving is 100 grams (=0.22 pounds) of culinary vegetables. Even though tomatoes and pumpkins are botanically speaking berry and fruits, they are still culinary vegetables because they are used as such.

Fluids.longExplanation: How much liquid do you drink in a normal day
Fluids.helpJson: Anything that is drunk counts as liquid, including alcoholic beverages.

HeadTrauma.longExplanation: How many concussions have you had that caused hospitilization, memory loss or loss of conscience

Drinking.longExplanation: How much alcohol do you drink in a normal week
Drinking.helpJson: A drink is defined as a US standard drink containing 14 grams of pure alcohol.

OralContraceptiveStatus.longExplanation: What is your history with oral contraceptives
OralContraceptiveStatus.helpJson: Oral contraceptives are also called birth control pills and are used to preven pregnancies.

OralContraceptiveStopped.longExplanation: How much time has passed since you stopped taking oral contraceptives
OralContraceptiveStopped.helpJson: Oral contraceptives are also called birth control pills and are used to preven pregnancies.

OralContraceptiveTillStop.longExplanation: For how long will you continue to take oral contraceptives
OralContraceptiveTillStop.helpJson: Oral contraceptives are also called birth control pills and are used to preven pregnancies.

RedMeat.longExplanation: How much red meat (beef/pork/lamb) do you eat in a normal day
RedMeat.helpJson: Red meat includes beef, pork, lamb, meat from goat, rabbit and similarly colored meat. It does not include chicken, birds and fish. Cooked red meat is still red meat.

HCVStatus.longExplanation: Are you infected with Hepatitis C

HIVStatus.longExplanation: Are you infected with HIV or AIDS

Smoking.longExplanation: What is your history with smoking tobacco

SmokingStopped.longExplanation: How much time has passed since you stopped smoking tobacco

SmokeIntensity.longExplanation: How much tobacco do you smoke in a normal day
SmokeIntensity.helpJson: If you smoke tobacco in other forms than cigarettes, you should convert it to thier equivalence in cigarettes. For example as a rule of thumb, one bowl of toccao in a pipe is equivalent to 2.5 cigarettes. More info on the [NHS Scotland website](http://www.smoking2.nes.scot.nhs.uk/module4/working-out-cigarette-equivalents.html)

SmokeDuration.longExplanation: For how long have you smoked tobacco

SmokePastAmount.longExplanation: During all the time smoking tobacco, what has been the average amount smoked in a normal day
SmokePastAmount.helpJson: If you smoke tobacco in other forms than cigarettes, you should convert it to thier equivalence in cigarettes. For example as a rule of thumb, one bowl of toccao in a pipe is equivalent to 2.5 cigarettes. More info on the [NHS Scotland website](http://www.smoking2.nes.scot.nhs.uk/module4/working-out-cigarette-equivalents.html)

IndoorTanning.longExplanation: How much time have you spent in indoor tanning beds in your life

Race.longExplanation: What race best describes your skin

MaxDrinking.longExplanation: In a normal week what is the highest amount of alcohol drunk during a sinle day
MaxDrinking.helpJson: A drink is defined as a US standard drink containing 14 grams of pure alcohol.

Fruits.longExplanation: How much fruit do you eat in a normal day
Fruits.helpJson: A standard fruit weighs 100 grams. An average apple is almost 200 grams.

FamilyHistoryParkinson.longExplanation: Does any person in your genetic family have or have had Parkinsons

PesticideExposure.longExplanation: In how many days have you been exposed to pesticides
PesticideExposure.helpJson: Your are exposed to pesticides primarily when you apply it either in your garden or in a field.

PhysicalMedium.longExplanation: How much time do you spend making medium intensity physical activity in a normal week
PhysicalMedium.helpJson: Medium physical activity includes brisk walking, gardening, golf etc.

PhysicalHard.longExplanation: How much time do you spend making high intensity physical activity in a normal week
PhysicalHard.helpJson: High physical activities make you lose your breath and includes running, playing high-intensity sports etc.

HPVVaccine.longExplanation: Which HPV vaccine have you received, if any
